charactor.fsp: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.
charactor.name: Emily

qs: What exactly do you need?
aw: I need advice on how to apologize.

aw01.st: I need advice on how to apologize.

qs: Can you share your situation?
aw: I said bad things about my friend.

aw01.st: I said bad things about my friend.

qs: Does your friend know?
aw: No, but I feel ashamed.

aw01.st: No, but I feel ashamed.

qs: Be honest, apologize, and say you feel sorry.
aw: Thank you.

aw01.st: Thank you.

fspSets.st: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.

charactor.fsp: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.
charactor.name: Emily

qs: What exactly do you need?
aw: I want to share a story about apologizing and its value.

aw01.st: I want to share a story about apologizing and its value.

qs: Great! Tell me your experience.
aw: I lied to my mom. I apologized, and now our relationship is better.

aw01.st: I lied to my mom. I apologized, and now our relationship is better.

qs: What do you want to say to the audience?
aw: If you are wrong, admit it. It helps relationships.

aw01.st: If you are wrong, admit it. It helps relationships.

qs: Thank you for sharing your story.
aw: Thank you so much.

aw01.st: Thank you so much.

fspSets.st: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.

charactor.fsp: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.
charactor.name: Sarah

qs: What exactly do you need?
aw: I want to send an apology message.

aw01.st: I want to send an apology message.

qs: Who do you want to apologize to?
aw: To my dad.

aw01.st: To my dad.

qs: Why do you want to apologize, and what is your message?
aw: I didn’t listen to my dad. Tell him I am sorry and I will do better.

aw01.st: I didn’t listen to my dad. Tell him I am sorry and I will do better.

qs: We will send your message to your dad.
aw: Thank you.

aw01.st: Thank you.

fspSets.st: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.

charactor.fsp: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.
charactor.name: Michael

qs: What exactly do you need?
aw: I need advice on how to apologize.

aw01.st: I need advice on how to apologize.

qs: Can you share your situation?
aw: I stayed up late and didn’t listen to my parents.

aw01.st: I stayed up late and didn’t listen to my parents.

qs: Did your parents scold you?
aw: A little, but they love me.

aw01.st: A little, but they love me.

qs: Don’t do it again. Your parents will feel sad.
aw: Thank you.

aw01.st: Thank you.

fspSets.st: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.

charactor.fsp: I joined the program: Apologizing for mistakes.
charactor.name: Emily

qs: What exactly do you need?
aw: I want to share a story about apologizing and its value.

aw01.st: I want to share a story about apologizing and its value.

qs: Great! Tell me your experience.
aw: I said bad things about my best friend, and they found out. I apologized, and now we are friends again.

aw01.st: I said bad things about my best friend, and they found out. I apologized, and now we are friends again.

qs: What do you want to say to the audience?
aw: Don’t talk badly about your friends. If you are wrong, apologize honestly.

aw01.st: Don’t talk badly about your friends. If you are wrong, apologize honestly.

qs: Thank you for sharing your story.
aw: Thank you.

aw01.st: Thank you.
